        public static void encodeSingle(int input,
                byte[] output,
                int outoff)
        Encodes a single octet into two nibbles.
        Parameters:
        input - the octet to encode.
        output - the array to which each encoded nibbles are written.
        outoff - the offset in the output array.

        Parameters:
        input - the input byte array
        inoff - the offset in the input array
        output - the array to which each encoded nibbles are written.
        outoff - the offset in the output array.

      • encode

        public static long encode(InputStream input,
          OutputStream output,
          byte[] inbuf,
          long length)
                   throws IOException
        Encodes all or specified number of octets in given input stream and writes encoded nibbles to given output stream.
        Parameters:
        input - the input stream
        output - the output stream
        inbuf - the buffer to use
        length - the maximum number of octets to encode
        Returns:
        the actual number of octets encoded
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

                    Charset inputCharset,
                    Charset outputCharset)
        Encodes given string.
        Parameters:
        input - the input string.
        inputCharset - the charset to decode input string
        outputCharset - the charset to encode output string.
        Returns:
